meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a museum.
meanings.sent1: The museological exhibit displayed ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The museum's museological approach focused on preserving historical items.
meanings.sent3: The museological tour guide made learning about art fun.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a museological treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The museological atmosphere transported visitors to another time.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of organizing and managing museums.
meanings.sent1: She pursued a career in museological studies to work in museums.
meanings.sent2: The museological of the museum ensured all exhibits were well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed a hands-on museological workshop at the museum.
meanings.sent4: His meticulous attention to detail in organizing exhibits was museological.
meanings.sent5: The importance of museological cannot be overstated in preserving history.
